column5: You will be staying in the master bedroom on the 3rd floor of the apartment building, with an exterior door giving access to your studio style space. Your privacy is assured. Come and go at your own leisure and convenience.  We are located inside Loop 610...Close to downtown and all points Houston. Great access to all the major highways. Find us in the historic, highly desired community of the Heights.  Notice you will have a microwave and mini-fridge to make longer stays comfortable.
column8: Private Entrance to Your Own Space
